channel.title: Shattered Horizon/ Fallout New Vegas Error's
channel.description:
Hi, just wandering if anyone can help with this.
I have both games, BUT unless i re-install my GPU drivers (GTX480) every time I play want to play either game, they will either, black screen on start-up (shattered horizon) or Stop working error on loading game (fallout)
both work like a dream once I re-install drivers and there are NO problems after that.
Just wandering if anyone has a hunch as it's an inconvenience. would like to put it at a stop if possible.
Thanks. :slight_smile:

item.title: Shattered Horizon/ Fallout New Vegas Error's
item.dc:creator: ar487
item.description:
Maverix26:

i heard it had something to do with memory leakage, and face rendering.

^ Your not alone, I started a thread a while ago about two performance mods, and I think the new face rendering is what’s screwing you over.

Hope this helps. Once you get it working correctly you’ll love it, FNV is in my top ten favorite games

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=7647
